text.value: 1. What is the name of the owner of the farm?
2. What is the age of the owner?
3. What is the education level of the owner of the farm?
4. What is your role on the farm?
5. How many people are working on this farm?
6. Which type of domestic animals/ chicken do you keep?
7. How many cattle do you have on the farm
8. Which cattle breeds do you currently have on the farm?
9. Which management style do you use?
10. For how long have you kept cattle?
11. What is the purpose of keeping cattle?
12. Have you had any of the following diseases in the last 12 months on the farm?
13. How do you usually determine the weight of cattle before giving antibiotics?
14. Which of the following antibiotics have ever been used at this farm
14.1. Which of the following antibiotics have ever been used at this farm
15. Which antibiotics among the mentioned above do you use most and why?
16. Who treats your cattle once they fall sick?
17. Where do you normally buy veterinary antibiotics?
18. Do drug sellers usually ask for prescription when selling veterinary antibiotics?
19. Where do you usually store your antibiotics?
20. Do you usually check for expiry dates before using veterinary antibiotics?
22. Which type of records in particular
23. Is the breeding bull shared with others?
24. What is the source of drinking water for cattle
25. What feeding practices are used on this farm?
26. Which month of the year do you feed hay, silage or/and crop residues to the whole herd?
27. Which month of the year do you feed concentrates and minerals to the whole herd
28. Are there any animal(s) here today that you brought in the last one year?
29. State the number of cattle which was brought in the herd
30. Do your cattle mix with other animals from other farms?
31. Which of the following animals from other farm mix with your cattle?
32. Which type of domestic chicken do you keep?
33. How many chickens do you have on your farm
34. Which management style do you practise?
35. For how long have you kept chicken
36. What is the purpose of keeping chicken?
37. What are the major diseases/disease symptoms of chickens do you encounter on your farm
37.1 What are the major diseases/disease symptoms of chickens do you encounter on your farm (others)
38. Who treats your chicken once they fall sick?
39. Which one is the most important medication normally used at this farm
40. Which one of the following antibiotics are commonly used
40.1 Which one of the following antibiotics are commonly used
42. Do you usually check for expiry dates before using antibiotics?
43. How is the antibiotics administered to chicken?
44. How frequent is the antibiotics administered following the treatment period?
45. How do you decide whether to use an antibiotic in a particular situation?
Contact a vet for advice before treatment
Treatment based on symptoms and experience
Treat and wait to see if it improves
46. How do you decide what antibiotics to use to keep in stock
47. Overall, on this farm which antibiotic was frequently used in the last one year and why?
47.1. Overall, on this farm which antibiotic was frequently used in the last one year and why? (Other)
48. Why the above antibiotics where frequently used?
